Dream Island Paddy:
Do you need a Raw Dragon Leather Shirt that contains dragon power? If you give me 1 billion adena and one of the following T-Shirts: Attack Reflection / Magic Reflection T-shirt, Shining Einhasad T-shirt modified by +10, then in return you will receive a Dragon Raw Leather Shirt.
In addition, if you give me one of the above t-shirts modified by +10, then in return you will receive a Skin Improvement Gemstone.
Please note that exchange is possible only if one of the indicated T-shirts is in the inventory.
